title: Cult Mom Lori Vallow: "I WANTED TO MURDER HIM,' now eyed in 4TH MURDER.
itunes:title: Cult Mom Lori Vallow: "I WANTED TO MURDER HIM,' now eyed in 4TH MURDER.
description:
As cult mom Lori Vallow awaits trial in the death of her children, we find out she has been named a person of interest in the death of her third husband, Joseph Ryan. Ryan's decomposing body was found in his home and his cause of death was ruled a heart attack. His body was then cremated. Audio has surfaced of Vallow saying she had a murderous heart and wanted to kill Ryan. Ryan and Vallow were in a custody battle over their daughter, Tylee.

Joining Nancy Grace Today:

  • Annie Cushing - sister of Joseph Ryan
  • Keith Taniguchi - Attorney for Joseph Ryan in divorce from Lori Vallow, Defense Attorney, Austin, Texas. www.keithtaniguchilaw.com
  • Dr. Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga www.angelaarnoldmd.com
  • Joe Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author, "Blood Beneath My Feet;" Featured on "Poisonous Liaisons" on True Crime Network
  • Nate Eaton - Reporter, East Idaho News


TIP LINE: Phoenix "Silent Witness" 480-WITNESS (480) 948-6377

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
